snippet.title: Wars, Murders to Rise Due to Global Warming?
snippet.description: Global warming-related shifts in temperature and rainfall could make the world more violent, a comprehensive new study says.

snippet.title: Restoring Trees to Save the World's Rarest Parrot
snippet.description: National Geographic explorer Steve Boyes talks about his work to pull the Cape parrot back from the brink of oblivion.

snippet.title: OCD Dogs, People Have Similar Brains; Is Your Dog OCD?
snippet.description: Dogs and people with OCD have similar brains—a discovery that may someday help doctors understand human anxiety, a new study says.

snippet.title: Fusion Energy Quest Faces Boundaries of Budget, Science
snippet.description: The idea of firing fusion power with lasers has hit major scientific and funding roadblocks. What does it mean for the effort to bring the energy of the stars to Earth?
